name: sekolah-pseo
description: Indonesian School PSEO Project - Data processing and static site generation for Indonesian schools

scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:py
scripts.test:js: node --test scripts/*.test.js || echo "No JavaScript tests found"
scripts.test:py: python3 -m pytest tests/ -v || echo "Python tests require pytest to be installed"
scripts.dev: npm run etl && npm run build && npm run sitemap
